titles.title: DMF Free Act of 2009
To prohibit the manufacture, sale, or distribution in commerce of any consumer product containing dimethylfumarate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/26/2009--Introduced. DMF Free Act of 2009 - Makes it unlawful for any person to manufacture for sale, offer for sale, or distribute in commerce any consumer product containing dimethylfumarate (DMF). Treats any consumer product containing DMF as a banned hazardous substance under the Federal Hazardous Substance Act and treats a violation of this Act as a violation of the Consumer Product Safety Act.
